phrs.translation: 防摩席, 帆索防磨垫
第一胃〔反邹动物的, 瘤胃

sentences.sentence: He finished his dessert and patted his paunch.
sentences.translation: 他吃完甜点，拍了拍自己的大肚子。

sentences.sentence: I took a look at my growing paunch. I joined a gym.
sentences.translation: 我看了看镜子里自己日渐发福的肚腩，决定加入健身俱乐部。

sentences.sentence: Men are more likely to gain fat around the waist, so anything fattening can pad the paunch.
sentences.translation: 男人们的腰周围很容易发胖[看来“游泳圈”男女都有]，所以任何吃了长肉的东西都会让肚子变胖。
